name: 「ステーシー」
description:
Based on Morning Musume's Stage play, Stacy's Shoujo Saisatsu Kageki.
Optimized for 1600x900 resolution, it includes an herbal tea icon for the "Return to Top" arrow and Stacy's logo in the top left corner.
Preview: http://25.media.tumblr.com/44cea618dad3e542e4e7a85479d2a221/tumblr_mlmehfGPOZ1sogpxto2_1280.png
